name: Dutch-Bangla Bank
description: Dutch-Bangla Bank Limited (DBBL) is a leading bank known for its extensive mobile banking services.

name: BRAC Bank
description: BRAC Bank offers personal, SME, and corporate banking with a strong digital presence through bKash and more.

name: City Bank
description: City Bank is known for its digital platform 'CityTouch' and a wide range of financial products.

name: Islami Bank
description: Islami Bank Bangladesh Limited operates under Shariah principles and serves millions across the country.

name: AB Bank
description: AB Bank was the first private bank in Bangladesh, offering diverse services from retail to corporate banking.

name: Sonali Bank
description: Sonali Bank is a state-owned bank with a vast branch network and government transaction services.
